page.title: 19WHY MOVE TO CLEADON & BOLDON
page.content: People move to Cleadon and East Boldon for many reasons but mainly job promotions.A better position means better pay and a better house. Some people prefer rural to urban living.Parents prefer their children to grow up in a rural setting with fresh air and open spaces.The villages are also ideal for commuting between the larger towns of Sunderland & South Shields & also the City of Newcastle. Some moved into the area when they were married & others needed a larger house as the family increased but wanted to live within the atmosphere of a village.A move may be necessary to be near parents or other members of a family.The last reason mentioned by our parents was choosing a school for the children.
